I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.

i am not really a blond.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going pretty well, thanks for asking! I just got done playing guitar for a while.
Cool! I love playing the guitar too. What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
Nice! I mostly play folk and country music.
I love folk music! Do you have any favorite folk artists?
I love a lot of different folk artists, but some of my favorites are Bob Dylan, Joan Baez, and Woody Guthrie.
Those are all great artists! I love their music too.
Me too! I'm also a big fan of traditional folk music from different cultures.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn more about traditional folk music from different cultures.
It's really interesting! I've learned a lot about different cultures by listening to their folk music.
That's so cool! I'm going to have to start listening to more traditional folk music.
